DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective follow-up study investigate 5-year clinical outcome patient ST-elevation myocardial infarction undergo remote ischemic conditioning primary percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Clinical Outcome Patients Undergoing Remote Ischemic Conditioning Before Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ST-elevation Myocardial Infarction : Follow-up Study
DOC.criteria: Chest pain admission hospital within 12 h onset , STsegment elevation > 0,1 mV 2 contiguous lead , 18 year old . leave bundle branch block , previous myocardial infarction , fibrinolytic treatment previous 30 day , previous coronary bypass surgery , leave main stem stenosis require coronary bypass surgery , severe heart failure require mechanical ventilation use intraaortic balloon pump .
